sentences.en: A deep gorge separates the two halves of the city.
sentences.cn: 有一道深谷把这座城市分成两部分.

sentences.en: An ice gorge has blocked the shipping lane.
By ten the fiver is broader. Steaming with the swift torrent, we leave Wu Gorge.
sentences.cn: 十点,江面渐趋广阔,急流稳渡. 穿过了巫峡.

sentences.en: Construction in the gorge was very busy. Everywhere people were at work.
sentences.cn: 可是最近这里工作很紧张, 到处都是冒着风雪劳动的人.

sentences.en: East of the gorge leveled out.
sentences.cn: 峡谷东面地势变得平坦起来.

sentences.en: Entering Lingguan Gorge, my irritation increased.
sentences.cn: 一进灵官峡, 我就心里发慌.

sentences.en: From the gorge came the noise of the stream in the boulders.
sentences.cn: 峡谷里传来溪水流过圆石间的淙淙声.

sentences.en: I could spend each day gorging on chocolate.
sentences.cn: 我可以将每一天都花在狂吃巧克力上。

sentences.en: It made my gorge rise to hear the news.
looking at it, Wendy felt her gorge rise.
My gorge [ stomach ] rises at it.
sentences.cn: 我一看见这东西就 恶心.

sentences.en: My gorge rose at the sight.
Soames's gorge had risen so that he could hardly speak.
sentences.cn: 索米斯的喉咙已经堵得完全说不出话来.

sentences.en: The south side of the gorge is now clothed in trees.
sentences.cn: 现在峡谷的南边已长满树木。

sentences.en: The water funnelled through the gorge and out onto the plain.
We were flying over the gorge , and Cas spotted him.
sentences.cn: 我们飞跃峡谷上方的时候,克斯看见了他.

sentences.en: Wind was funnelling through the gorge.

trans.tran_cn: 山峡，峡谷，咽喉，暴食，障碍物
trans.tran_en: a deep narrow valley with steep sides
If you gorge on something or gorge yourself on it, you eat lots of it in a very greedy way
